input.sentences: i rememer seeing this picture in my art appreciation class
they all look like they are from the same era
i think artists appreciate life so much
that have to make a carbon copy of it to perserve
output.sentences: I admired oil paintings of people paddling canoes.
I admired oil paintings of rivers.
I admired oil paintings of meadows.
Most of all I wanted to live in Venice and be an artist myself.
